definition: husk/(of a radish etc) spongy (and therefore unappetising)
to sift chaff/(fig.) to shake all over
chaff, husks, distillers' dregs etc (food eaten by the poor)/(fig.) rubbish/junk/(abbr. for 糟糠妻[zao1 kang1 qi1]) wife who goes through the hardships of poverty with her husband
instant results/lit. blow the husk and see the rice
wife who goes through the hardships of poverty with her husband

sentences.english: Suggestions are made for the production of furfural alcohol in China.
sentences.chinese: 並對我國的糠醇生產提出了建議。

sentences.english: Let them be as chaff before the wind: and let the angel of the LORD chase them.
sentences.chinese: 願他們像風前的糠，有耶和華的使者趕逐他們。

sentences.english: Crumb calls "Shenandoah" one of the most beautiful folk songs of any country.
sentences.chinese: 糠所說的“雪蘭”之一的任何國家最美麗的民歌。

sentences.english: The grinding machine separates the grain from the husk.
The decoloring effect and feasibility to filtrate dyestuff and their mixture by pleurotus ostreatus culture was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了用菌糠過濾處理染料溶液可行性。

sentences.english: May they be like chaff before the wind, with the angel of the Lord driving them away;
sentences.chinese: 願他們像風前的糠，有耶和華的使者趕逐他們。

sentences.english: Single flower single day nectar volume and temperature and humidity habitats Tilia no significant correlation.
sentences.chinese: 單花單日泌蜜量與糠椴生境溫溼度沒有顯著的相關性。

sentences.english: Stir together breadcrumbs and milk and add to meat mixture.
sentences.chinese: 麪包糠和牛奶混合後也加入肉糜。

sentences.english: Niutrition Components of glandless cottons stalk and worthless stuff of mushroom-plantted are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了低酚棉的秸杆及其種蘑菇後的菌糠的營養成分。

sentences.english: We had no foods to eat, so many people had starved to death.
sentences.chinese: 當年我們喫糠咽菜，不知道餓死了多少人。

sentences.english: The refined wax through recrystallization leads to white crystalline wax.
sentences.chinese: 精製後的糠蠟經乙醇重結晶，還可得到白色的結晶蠟。

sentences.english: The colouring mechanism of bagacillo is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 對蔗渣糠的致色機理也進行了初步探討。

sentences.english: The process for the synthesis of pyridine using tetrahydrofurfuryl alcohol(THFA)as material was researched in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本論文主要研究了以四氫糠醇爲原料合成吡啶的工藝。

sentences.english: A novel furan resin was synthesized by polycondensation between furfuralcohol and furfural.
sentences.chinese: 用糠醇和糠醛縮聚製備了新型呋喃樹脂。
